text: Nedowein (or Nidowin) is a village in Margibi County, Liberia, near the capital Monrovia's international airport. A case of Ebola virus disease was diagnosed in Nedowein in late June 2015, leading to a number of people in the village being put under quarantine. == References == Category:Populated places in Liberia Category:Margibi County
title: Nedowein
